item.text: Then Jesus, full of the Holy Spirit, returned from the Jordan River and was led by the Spirit in the wilderness,

where for <st data-num="5062" class="">forty</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> he <st data-num="3985">endured temptations</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st>. He<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2068">ate</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">during</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="4931" class="">completed</st>,<n id="4" /> he was <st data-num="3983" class="">famished</st>.

The <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1487">If</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3004">command</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>.”<n id="2" />
Jesus answered him, “It is written, ‘Man does not live by bread alone.’”
Then the devil led him up to a high place and showed him in a flash all the kingdoms of the world.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1228">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “To <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="2" /> I will <st data-num="1325" class="">grant</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="537" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">realm</st><n id="3" />—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> that goes along with <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3754">for</st> it has been <st data-num="3860" class="">relinquished</st><n id="5" /> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I can <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">anyone</st> I <st data-num="2309" class="">wish</st>.

<st data-num="3767">So then</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="3956">all this</st> will <st data-num="1510">be</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st>.”
Jesus answered him, “It is written, ‘You are to worship the Lord your God and serve only him.’”
Then the devil brought him to Jerusalem, had him stand on the highest point of the temple, and said to him, “If you are the Son of God, throw yourself down from here,
for it is written, ‘He will command his angels concerning you, to protect you,’
and ‘with their hands they will lift you up, so that you will not strike your foot against a stone.’”
Jesus answered him, “It is said, ‘You are not to put the Lord your God to the test.’”
So when the devil had completed every temptation, he departed from him until a more opportune time.
Then Jesus, in the power of the Spirit, returned to Galilee, and news about him spread throughout the surrounding countryside.
He began to teach in their synagogues and was praised by all.
Now Jesus came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up, and went into the synagogue on the Sabbath day, as was his custom. He stood up to read,
and the scroll of the prophet Isaiah was given to him. He unrolled the scroll and found the place where it was written,

“The Spirit of the Lord is upon me,

because he has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor.

He has sent me to proclaim release to the captives

and the regaining of sight to the blind,

to set free those who are oppressed,
to proclaim the year of the Lord’s favor.”
Then he rolled up the scroll, gave it back to the attendant, and sat down. The eyes of everyone in the synagogue were fixed on him.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4594" class="">Today</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st> has been <st data-num="4137" class="">fulfilled</st> even <st data-num="1722" class="">as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3775">heard</st> it being read.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="3140">speaking well</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">gracious</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> <st data-num="1607">coming out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>. They<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3756">Isn’t</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2501">Joseph’s</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>?”

Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3843">No doubt</st> you will <st data-num="3004" class="">quote</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> the <st data-num="3850" class="">proverb</st>, ‘<st data-num="2395">Physician</st>, <st data-num="2323" class="">heal</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself!’</st><n id="2" /> and say, ‘<st data-num="3745" class="">What</st> we have <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> that you <st data-num="1096" class="">did</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2584" class="">Capernaum</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3968" class="">hometown</st> <st data-num="2532">too</st>.’”

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">added</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1184" class="">acceptable</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3968" class="">hometown</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, there <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5503" class="">widows</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2243">Elijah’s</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="2808">shut up</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="3376 1803">half</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st><n id="3" /> there <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="3042" class="">famine</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st> was <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">none</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1508">but only</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> who was a <st data-num="5503" class="">widow</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4558" class="">Zarephath</st> in <st data-num="4606" class="">Sidon</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3015">lepers</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909">in</st> <st data-num="2474">Israel</st> <st data-num="1909">in</st> the time of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="1666" class="">Elisha</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3762" class="">none</st> <st data-num="1666" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> was <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansed</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">except</st> <st data-num="3497" class="">Naaman</st> the <st data-num="4948" class="">Syrian</st>.”<n id="4" />

When they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="3956">all</st> the people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st> were <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> with <st data-num="2372" class="">rage</st>.

They <st data-num="450">got up</st>, <st data-num="1544" class="">forced</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">out of</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3790" class="">brow</st> of the <st data-num="3735" class="">hill</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> was <st data-num="3618" class="">built</st>, <st data-num="5620">so that</st><n id="3" /> they could <st data-num="2630" class="">throw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2630">down</st> the cliff.<n id="4" />
But he passed through the crowd and went on his way.
So he went down to Capernaum, a town in Galilee, and on the Sabbath he began to teach the people.
They were amazed at his teaching because he spoke with authority.
Now in the synagogue there was a man who had the spirit of an unclean demon, and he cried out with a loud voice,

“<st data-num="1436">Ha</st>! Leave <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> alone,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3479" class="">Nazarene</st>! Have you <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="622" class="">destroy</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>? I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st>—the <st data-num="40">Holy One</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him:</st><n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5392" class="">Silence</st>! <st data-num="1831" class="">Come out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st>, after the <st data-num="1140" class="">demon</st> <st data-num="4496" class="">threw</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">man</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4494">down</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> their <st data-num="3319" class="">midst</st>, he <st data-num="1831" class="">came out</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">without</st> <st data-num="984" class="">hurting</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="5" />

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2285" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began to <st data-num="4814" class="">say</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What’s</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">happening</st> <st data-num="3778">here</st>?<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st><n id="4" /> he <st data-num="2004" class="">commands</st> the <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="1831">come out</st>!”
So the news about him spread into all areas of the region.
After Jesus left the synagogue, he entered Simon’s house. Now Simon’s mother-in-law was suffering from a high fever, and they asked Jesus to help her.
So he stood over her, commanded the fever, and it left her. Immediately she got up and began to serve them.
As the sun was setting, all those who had any relatives sick with various diseases brought them to Jesus. He placed his hands on every one of them and healed them.
Demons also came out of many, crying out, “You are the Son of God!” But he rebuked them and would not allow them to speak because they knew that he was the Christ.
The next morning Jesus departed and went to a deserted place. Yet the crowds were seeking him, and they came to him and tried to keep him from leaving them.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2097">proclaim the good news</st> of the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> to the <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">towns</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> is what I was <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st><n id="5" /> to do.”<n id="6" />
So he continued to preach in the synagogues of Judea.
